text: Solrinnes is a commune in the Nord department in northern France.INSEE commune file == Heraldry == The arms of Solrinnes are blazoned (clearly marked) : Quarterly 1&4: Argent, 3 fesses gules; 2&3: Argent, 3 wagoner's axes top 2 addorsed gules.Arms of the families of Croÿ-Solre and Croÿ-Renty quartered (Bermerain, Étrœungt, Féron, Ferrière-la-Grande, Lez-Fontaine, Rousies, Solre- le-Château and Solrinnes use the same arms.). == References == Category:Communes in Nord
title: Solrinnes
